alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Fayette; Gonzales; Lee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 11:41PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Caldwell, southeastern Bastrop, northeastern Gonzales, southeastern Lee and Fayette Counties through 1230 AM CST... At 1141 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cistern, or 11 miles northwest of Flatonia, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Giddings, La Grange, Smithville, Waelder, Fayetteville, Round Top, Muldoon, Cistern, Carmine, Northrup, Rutersville, Warrenton, Ledbetter, Waldeck, Loebau, Plum, Thompsonville, Mullins Prairie, Nechanitz, and Serbin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
